00044 class RigidAccumulator
00045 {
00046 public:
00047         RigidAccumulator()
00048         {
00049                 Clear();
00050         }
00051 
00052         ~RigidAccumulator()
00053         {
00054         }
00055 
00056         void Clear()
00057         {
00058                 PMath::Zero(m_Force);
00059                 PMath::Zero(m_Torque);
00060         }
00061 
00062         void AddForce(PMath::Vec3f a)           { PMath::Add(m_Force, a); }
00063         void AddTorque(PMath::Vec3f a)  { PMath::Add(m_Torque, a); }
00064 
00065         PMath::Vec3f    m_Force;
00066         PMath::Vec3f    m_Torque;
00067 };
00068 
00072 class DynamicState
00073 {
00074 public:
00075         DynamicState()
00076         {
00077                 SetAtRest();
00078         }
00079 
00080         ~DynamicState() { }
00081 
00082         DynamicState& operator=(const DynamicState& right)
00083         {       // assign _Right
00084                 if (this != &right) {
00085                         PMath::Set(m_Orientation,               right.m_Orientation);
00086                         PMath::Set(m_Position,                  right.m_Position);
00087                         PMath::Set(m_Velocity,                  right.m_Velocity);
00088                         PMath::Set(m_AngularVelocity,   right.m_AngularVelocity);
00089                         PMath::Set(m_AngularMomentum,   right.m_AngularMomentum);
00090                 }
00091                 return (*this);
00092         }
00093 
00094         void    SetAtRest()
00095         {
00096                 m_Orientation[0] = Real(0.0f);
00097                 m_Orientation[0] = Real(0.0f);
00098                 m_Orientation[0] = Real(0.0f);
00099                 m_Orientation[0] = Real(1.0f);
00100                 PMath::Zero(m_Position);
00101                 PMath::Zero(m_Velocity);
00102                 PMath::Zero(m_AngularVelocity);
00103                 PMath::Zero(m_AngularMomentum);
00104         }
00105 
00106         PMath::Quaternion       m_Orientation;
00107         PMath::Vec3f            m_Position;
00108         PMath::Vec3f            m_Velocity;
00109         PMath::Vec3f            m_AngularVelocity;
00110         PMath::Vec3f            m_AngularMomentum;
00111 };

00119 class RigidBody

00150 
00151         inline  void                    SetAngularVelocityDamp(Real value)      { m_AngularVelocityDamp = value * Real(0.995); }                // ensure there's a tiny bit of damping to compensate for our simple integrator
00152         inline  void                    SetLinearVelocityDamp(Real value)       { m_LinearVelocityDamp = value * Real(0.995f);  }               // ensure there's a tiny bit of damping to compensate for our simple integrator
00153 
00154         inline  Real                    GetAngularVelocityDamp() const          { return m_AngularVelocityDamp * Real(1.0f / 0.995f); } // return the value the app actually input in the first place
00155         inline  Real                    GetLinearVelocityDamp() const           { return m_LinearVelocityDamp * Real(1.0f / 0.995f); }  // return the value the app actually input in the first place
00156 
00157                         void                    SetRender(GraphObj::Base * pObj) { m_pRender = pObj; }                  
00158                         void                    Render();
